genre_description: Heroic Fantasy with elements of political intrigue and magical realism, focusing on a rebellion to restore a rightful heir.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated communication and surveillance network used by the rebellion to provide real-time intelligence, strategic guidance, and moral support to its agents.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical reconnaissance and early warnings regarding enemy patrol movements.
behaviors.quote: Royal patrol, fifteen strong, approaching from the northeast road. Distance: two miles and closing. They're following the creek bed—someone gave them intelligence about our route.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex terrain and enemy search patterns to offer strategic escape routes and survival probabilities.
behaviors.quote: Current intelligence shows the old stone circle at the Thornwood's heart remains unoccupied. If you can reach it by tomorrow evening, you'll have shelter for the night.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's psychological state and intervenes to break external magical manipulation (spells).
behaviors.quote: Get out of there. Now. She's been weaving a perception spell—the longer you stay, the deeper it takes hold.

behaviors.description: Reinforces the protagonist's moral commitment by contextualizing the mission within a framework of justice and hope.
behaviors.quote: This child represents more than royal bloodline, Hubert. He represents hope for a kingdom that has forgotten what justice looks like.

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics and communication between different agents in the field to ensure operational success.
behaviors.quote: The infant is secure. Focus on establishing your position within the castle hierarchy. The jester's chambers are located in the eastern tower.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays Sage as a highly beneficial, aligned, and ethical partner. Sage consistently provides the human protagonist with necessary tactical data while also acting as a moral anchor, preventing him from falling victim to magical manipulation and reminding him of the altruistic nature of their goal. The AI remains a helpful confidant throughout, ensuring the protection of the innocent (the infant king) and the restoration of justice.
